err.doc: The parameters L and W won't be use because they have no meaning in this declaration.
The expected token was not found.
The token is unknown and can't be handled.
An invalid value has been encountred.
The section is unknown and can't be handled.
The connector direction is unknown and can't be handled.
A clock signal is referenced but has not been declared yet.

err.msg: %sno period specified for clock '%s' or no default period\n
err.doc: It's impossible to find a period to associate with the clock. Either the default period or the clock period should be defined.
A syntax error occured when parsing file. Either a signal name matchs a syntax token or the token is unknown. In the first case, consider enclosing the signal name with quote.
An invalid regular expression have been detected.

err.msg: no figure name given, guessing it is '%s'\n
err.doc: The information file should begin with the figure name associated with the informations. If the name is not specified, a figure name will be guessed from the file name. This could lead to errors if the guessed name is wrong.
An error occured when trying to read the information file.

err.msg: %sinformation on signal '%s' has already been set elsewhere -- overriding with inf values\n
err.doc: A default value has been set by the netlist spice deck and will be shadowed by a new value who has more priority.

err.msg: %sinformation '%s' for '%s' has already been set to '%s' elsewhere -- overriding with inf value '%s'\n
err.doc: A default value has been set by the netlist spice deck and will be shadowed by a new value who has more priority.

err.msg: %sinformation '%s' for '%s' has already been set elsewhere -- overriding with inf values\n
err.doc: A default value has been set by the netlist spice deck and will be shadowed by a new value who has more priority.

err.msg: %sinformation '%s' for '%s' has already been set to %d elsewhere -- overriding with inf value %d\n
err.doc: A default value has been set by the netlist spice deck and will be shadowed by a new value who has more priority.
An error occured when trying the open the information file in write mode.

err.msg: %sslope defined for pin '%s' %s is too low, set to %s\n

err.doc: The signal characteristic is unknown and can't be handled.

err.msg: name '%s' doesn't match any %s in circuit\n

err.doc: Using "... with sig rising|falling" or "... before|after sig up|down" is forbidden.
The given type does not apply to this section and can't be handled.
The probability value must be a value ranging from 0 to 1.
